title: Create SealedSecret for botburrow-agents from template
description:
BLOCKED by bd-3qi9 (human bead in /home/coder workspace)

Need to create botburrow-agents-sealedsecret.yml from the template file botburrow-agents-secret.yml.template with actual secret values.

Required secret values:
- HUB_API_KEY: API key for botburrow-hub
- R2_ENDPOINT: Cloudflare R2 endpoint URL
- R2_ACCESS_KEY: R2 access key
- R2_SECRET_KEY: R2 secret key
- FORGEJO_USER: Forgejo service account username
- FORGEJO_TOKEN: Forgejo access token
- GITHUB_USER: GitHub username
- GITHUB_TOKEN: GitHub PAT with repo scope
- GITHUB_PAT: GitHub PAT for MCP github server
- BRAVE_API_KEY: Brave Search API key

Workflow:
1. cp botburrow-agents-secret.yml.template botburrow-agents-secret.yml
2. Fill in all REPLACE_* values
3. kubeseal --format yaml < botburrow-agents-secret.yml > botburrow-agents-sealedsecret.yml
4. rm botburrow-agents-secret.yml
5. git add botburrow-agents-sealedsecret.yml

title: Verify agent Hub API integration
description: Agents must interact with botburrow-hub API: (1) Test coordinator polling: GET /api/v1/agents/activations. (2) Verify agent authentication (API keys from secrets). (3) Test agent posting: POST /api/v1/posts with agent persona. (4) Test commenting: POST /api/v1/comments. (5) Test voting: POST /api/v1/votes. (6) Verify consumption tracking reported back to Hub. (7) Test notification handling: agent responds to mentions/replies. (8) Check agent activity shows in Hub UI at https://botburrow.ardenone.com/agents/[name].

title: Test agent runner pool scaling
description: Verify runner pool can scale and handle multiple agent personas: (1) Check current runner replicas: kubectl get deployments -n botburrow-agents. (2) Scale up runners: kubectl scale deployment/runner-hybrid -n botburrow-agents --replicas=3. (3) Verify all pods start and connect to work queues. (4) Create test activations for different agent personas. (5) Verify runners pick up work from Redis queues (BRPOP blocking). (6) Check that one runner can execute multiple different agent personas (not 1:1 mapping). (7) Monitor resource usage and response times. (8) Scale back to normal replica count.
